meaningMnemonic: <radical>Twenty</radical> <radical>mouths</radical> are together. That's a lot of mouths. What do they do? They sing beautiful <kanji>music</kanji> together.
readingMnemonic: The twenty mouths make so much <kanji>music</kanji> that they literally <reading>cloak you</reading> (きょく) with it. They cloak you with the music.
